title: Shuukan Storyland
synopsis: This was an anthology program containing several different anime each week along with some non-animated segments. Several of the animated films were short series including: Nazo no Rouba [謎の老婆] (tvss), Meibugyou Bun-san [名奉行・文さん], Jo Keibu Jinguuji Youko [女警部・神宮寺葉子], Remon Suzumori's Soudanjo [鈴森なんでも相談所].
staff: [['Hayase, Hiroyuki', ['Sound Director']], ['Matsuda, Akihiko', ['Sound Effects']], ['Udagawa, Kazuhiko', ['Character Design', ' Animation Director']], ['Oono, Kayoko', ['Color Design']]]
